TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstancePoolResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing an InstancePool along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetInstancePoolResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetInstancePool method.
